meanings.meaning_en_US: A period of ten years.

examples.sentence: The last [decade] saw significant changes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 過去的十年目睹了重大變革

examples.sentence: They plan to retire in the next [decade].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們計劃在下個十年退休

examples.sentence: Fashion trends change every [decade].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 時尚潮流每十年都會變化

meanings.meaning_en_US: The vapor into which water is converted when heated.

examples.sentence: The [steam] rose from the hot soup.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 熱湯上冒出蒸氣。

examples.sentence: He likes to cook vegetables with [steam].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡用蒸氣煮蔬菜。

examples.sentence: The [steam] engine revolutionized transport.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 蒸汽機改變了交通運輸。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person or thing that brings something into existence.

examples.sentence: He is the [creator] of the famous app.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是著名應用程式的創造者

examples.sentence: Every [creator] has a unique style.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位創造者都有獨特的風格

examples.sentence: The [creator] of this game is very talented.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這款遊戲的創造者非常有才華

meanings.meaning_en_US: A section of written text or a channel through which people or things can pass.

examples.sentence: Please read the [passage] on page five.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請閱讀第五頁的段落。

examples.sentence: The narrow [passage] led to the garden.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 狹窄的通道通往花園。

examples.sentence: He found a secret [passage] in the old house.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在老房子裡發現了一個秘密通道。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The main stem of a tree.

examples.sentence: The [trunk] of the oak tree is very thick.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這棵橡樹的樹幹非常粗。

examples.sentence: She leaned against the [trunk] while resting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在休息時靠在樹幹上。

examples.sentence: The elephant has a long [trunk].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這隻大象有一條長長的鼻子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Involved in the formation of something.

examples.sentence: There are several [underlying] causes of the problem.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個問題有幾個潛在的原因

examples.sentence: The [underlying] issues must be addressed first.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 必須首先解決潛在問題

examples.sentence: Its [underlying] significance is often overlooked.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 其潛在的重要性常常被忽視

meanings.meaning_en_US: The act of intentionally causing one's own death.

examples.sentence: He spoke about the stigma surrounding [suicide].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他談到了圍繞自殺的污名

examples.sentence: Support groups exist to help those affected by [suicide].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 存在支持小組以幫助受到自殺影響的人

examples.sentence: Preventing [suicide] is a crucial part of mental health care.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 預防自殺是心理健康護理的重要部分

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to mathematics or the principles of mathematics.

examples.sentence: He has a strong [mathematical] ability.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他有很強的數學能力

examples.sentence: The team solved the [mathematical] problems quickly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這隊伍迅速解決了數學問題

examples.sentence: She enjoys [mathematical] puzzles and challenges.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡數學謎題和挑戰

meanings.meaning_en_US: A liquid or semi-liquid substance used to add flavor to food.

examples.sentence: I love to add [sauce] to my pasta.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡在意大利麵上加入醬汁。

examples.sentence: The chef prepared a special [sauce] for the dish.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 廚師為這道菜準備了一種特別的醬汁。

examples.sentence: This [sauce] is spicy and delicious.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這款醬汁既辣又美味。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A road vehicle, typically with four wheels, powered by an internal combustion engine or electric motor.

examples.sentence: He bought a new [automobile] to commute to work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他買了一輛新汽車來通勤。

examples.sentence: The [automobile] industry is constantly evolving.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 汽車行業不斷發展。

examples.sentence: She prefers electric [automobiles] for their environmental benefits.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她偏好電動汽車因為它們的環保優勢。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Chance or luck as an arbitrary force affecting human affairs.

examples.sentence: He made a [fortune] in the stock market.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在股市上賺了一筆運氣。

examples.sentence: They believe that [fortune] favors the brave.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們相信運氣總是青睞勇者。

examples.sentence: She had the [fortune] to travel the world.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她有運氣得以環遊世界。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A large structure for sports events, concerts, and other activities.

examples.sentence: The concert will be held in the [stadium].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 音樂會將在體育場舉行。

examples.sentence: Thousands of fans filled the [stadium] to watch the game.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 成千上萬的球迷填滿體育場觀看比賽。

examples.sentence: The [stadium] was built in 1990.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個體育場建於1990年。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A musical composition or arrangement.

examples.sentence: She hummed a cheerful [tune].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她哼了一首快樂的曲調。

examples.sentence: The orchestra played a beautiful [tune].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 樂團演奏了一首美妙的曲子。

examples.sentence: He has a knack for creating catchy [tunes].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他擅長創作朗朗上口的曲子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who is the property of another and is forced to obey them.

examples.sentence: They fought for the rights of [slaves].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們為奴隸的權利而戰。

examples.sentence: History shows the cruelty of [slavery].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 歷史展示了奴隸制的殘酷。

examples.sentence: He decided to learn about his ancestor who was a [slave].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定了解他的祖先是一名奴隸。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A painting, drawing, photograph, or engraving of a person, especially one depicting only the face or head and shoulders.

examples.sentence: The artist painted a beautiful [portrait] of her grandmother.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 藝術家畫了奶奶的美麗肖像

examples.sentence: He hung the [portrait] on the wall.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他把肖像掛在牆上

examples.sentence: The gallery featured a famous [portrait] of a historical figure.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 畫廊展出了對一位歷史人物的著名肖像

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who uses unlawful violence and intimidation, especially against civilians, in pursuit of political aims.

examples.sentence: The government is determined to combat [terrorist] activities.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 政府決心打擊恐怖分子活動。

examples.sentence: They arrested a suspected [terrorist] in the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在城市逮捕了一名疑似恐怖分子。

examples.sentence: The attack was carried out by a [terrorist] group.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這次攻擊是由一個恐怖分子組織發動的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Made or produced by human beings rather than occurring naturally.

examples.sentence: The park features an [artificial] lake that attracts visitors.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個公園有一個吸引遊客的人工湖。

examples.sentence: Many products now use [artificial] ingredients in their recipes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多產品在食譜中使用人工成分。

examples.sentence: The scientist specializes in [artificial] intelligence research.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位科學家專注於人工智慧的研究。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A flat piece of material, typically with a smooth surface, used for writing or drawing.

examples.sentence: He took notes on his [tablet].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在平板上做筆記

examples.sentence: The [tablet] was used for ancient inscriptions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這塊平板用於古老的雕刻

examples.sentence: She bought a new digital [tablet] for drawing.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她買了一個新的數字平板來畫畫

meanings.meaning_en_US: The power or quality of delighting, attracting, or fascinating others.

examples.sentence: Her smile had a unique [charm].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的微笑有著獨特的魅力

examples.sentence: He used his [charm] to win her over.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用他的魅力贏得了她的心

examples.sentence: The [charm] of the old town attracts many tourists.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 古鎮的魅力吸引了許多遊客

meanings.meaning_en_US: An area of grassland, especially in a park or garden.

examples.sentence: The children were playing on the [lawn].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們在草坪上玩。

examples.sentence: She mowed the [lawn] yesterday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她昨天修剪了草坪。

examples.sentence: We had a picnic on the [lawn].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在草坪上野餐。
